long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MURDER is an exhilarating game available as a Chrome extension. In this game, players find themselves in a mysterious mansion filled with suspense and intrigue. Each player is assigned a role as either an innocent bystander, a detective, or the murderer. The objective for the innocents and the detective is to identify and expose the murderer, while the murderer's goal is to eliminate all the other players without getting caught.

Throughout the game, players must navigate the mansion, search for clues, and interact with other characters to gather information. The detective has access to special abilities and tools that can aid in the investigation, while the murderer must use stealth and cunning to eliminate their targets discreetly. The game creates an intense atmosphere as players try to outwit and outmaneuver each other.

With its immersive gameplay and suspenseful storyline, "MURDER" offers a thrilling and strategic gaming experience. You can play this game for free on the website https://classroom-6x.org/. So gather your wits, sharpen your detective skills, or embrace your inner murderer and step into the enigmatic world of "MURDER."

*Note: We have added "Classroom 6x, Poki Unblocked" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website https://classroom-6x.org, https://poki.ee
